Articles.Content: So, I started a new career series. I became a contract to rescue a Kerbal from orbit. Everything normal. But after I rendezvoused with him, turns out he's in a Stayputnik probe core! How the Kraken should I rescue him? He can't go EVA, that's the problem.

Klaw the Stayputnik

Also, report this bug in the bug tracker.
How did he get in there in the first place? If he is even in there...
This is clearly a Stayputnik AI that has become self aware and is pretending to be a kerbal, if you bring it to the ground it will take over the world!
If he really is in there, he is probably already dead! (Unless it's a Kerbal pokeball of sorts...![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Clearly it's not a Stayputnik at all, but rather a disguised [rescue ball](http://www.astronautix.com/craft/reseball.htm).

![ballper3.jpg](http://www.astronautix.com/graphics/b/ballper3.jpg)

Use the Klaw! But be gentle, you don't wanna pop it.

> 
> How did he get in there in the first place? If he is even in there...

He IS in there, it shows me a black IVA trough a very useful mod.

> 
> This is clearly a Stayputnik AI that has become self aware and is pretending to be a kerbal, if you bring it to the ground it will take over the world!

Hm, nothing happened after I recovered himÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

> 
> If he really is in there, he is probably already dead! (Unless it's a Kerbal pokeball of sorts...![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Maybe it's a Laika-style one-way capsule?

> 
> Klaw the Stayputnik
> Also, report this bug in the bug tracker.

I was too early in career to have the Klaw, I used some KAS parts after I .cfg edited them earlier into the tree ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif). I'll also report it to the bug-squasher-thingy. In the end, after nearly roasting the Stayputnik, I successfully recovered this thing and got some funds and a new Kerbonaut.

Edit:

Geschosskopf, could you add a link to the Bugtracker? I can't seem to find ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif).
